ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_WATER.description: Normal water that can be collected anywhere. It can be drunk and used as an ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_WATER.name: Clean Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_MILK.description: Milk from goats. It's said to be denser than cow's milk and has a unique flavor.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_MILK.name: Goats Milk

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_BAMBOO.description: Water sucked up from the ground by grown bamboo. It has a slightly sweet smell.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_BAMBOO.name: Water Bamboo

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_PLANTJUICE.description: A grassy-smelling extract obtained from plants. Not impossible to drink but has a horrible taste.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_PLANTJUICE.name: Plant Essence

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_HARD.description: Water containing a lot of mineral matter. It may be harmful to health if drunk.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_HARD.name: Roteswasser Tonic

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_RAPWAR.description: Rain water accumulated at the center of a giant flower. It has the scent of the flower and can be used as a perfume.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_RAPWAR.name: Rapwar Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_FOAM.description: Bubbly water. Many like to drink it cold.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_FOAM.name: Foamy Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_JADE.description: Beautiful-looking water made for appreciation. Not made for consumption.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_JADE.name: Jade Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_ANCIENT.description: Precious water containing ancient components. It does not get warm easily, so it's always very cold.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_ANCIENT.name: Ancient Blue Water

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_CURIOS.description: A liquid that emits various colors when exposed to light. It becomes normal water if it stays in contact with air for long periods.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_CURIOS.name: Curious Aqua

ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_BLACK.description: Dirty water containing a lot of impurities. It's said to be an excellent alchemy ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_LIQUID_BLACK.name: Black Water

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_NANASHI.description: A type of weed that is so common that its even hard to give it a name. Its characteristic is that it has no characteristics.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_NANASHI.name: Nameless Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_MUGI.description: Roteswasser-made wheat containing a lot of iron. It may cause iron overload if eaten in excess.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_MUGI.name: Wasser Wheat

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_KOGE.description: Completely dry leaf. Often used as firing material because of its high ignitability.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_KOGE.name: Dry Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_LITTUCE.description: A lettuce that was given this name because its harvest is big enough to make a hill. The taste is normal.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_LITTUCE.name: Hill Lettuce

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BLUE.description: A herb with components that purify dirty water. Things in Roteswasser are green because of the soil.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BLUE.name: Blue Herb

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_KELP.description: A type of seaweed available at the sea. It's mineral-rich and often used for cooking.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_KELP.name: Rishikelp

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BITE.description: A type of grass that bites if you touch its leaves. The bite is not painful, though, because it's a leaf.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BITE.name: Chomping Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_SWEET.description: A leaf with sugar stored. Little known, maybe because of its ordinary looks.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_SWEET.name: Sweet Leaf

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_ANCIENT.description: A branch from an ancient tree with strong vitality. Many of them can be found under those trees.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_ANCIENT.name: Ancient Branch

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BELL.description: Grass that looks like a hanging bell. Unfortunately, it makes no sound when swung.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_BELL.name: Campanula

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_DIATOM.description: A type of moss that grows underwater. It contains luminous components, so it's always shining.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_DIATOM.name: Glowing Diatom

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_CLOVER.description: A leaf that makes you happy when you find it. It has the same components as the three-leafed version.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_CLOVER.name: Lucky Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_AOTUME.description: White clover, but because of the Roteswasser soil, it became green.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_AOTUME.name: Blue Clover

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_HIKARI.description: A plant with the power of absorbing light. Slightly better when used on a sunny day.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_HIKARI.name: Light Absorbing Grass

ITEM_MAT_PLANT_ROSEN.description: A leaf often used as a cooking spice. Because of its strong smell, not everybody is a fan.
ITEM_MAT_PLANT_ROSEN.name: Rosen Leaf

ITEM_MAT_UNI_NORMAL.description: A seed with sharp thorns that can be picked in forests. It's regarded highly as a throwing weapon.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_NORMAL.name: Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_ANCIENT.description: Ancient Uni found in ruins. It's said to be the ancestor of modern Uni.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_ANCIENT.name: Ancient Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_AQUA.description: Uni found underwater. It has a property of absorbing poison, and that poison is accumulated in the thorns.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_AQUA.name: Water Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_CHARCOAL.description: A type of Uni that is sensitive to heat and turns to charcoal just by being exposed to strong sunlight.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_CHARCOAL.name: Charcoal Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_GOLDEN.description: A very rare type of Golden Uni. It's negotiated at a higher price than actual gold.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_GOLDEN.name: Gold Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_DEMON.description: An Uni with thick thorns that look like devil horns. The two thorns are sharp but break easily.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_DEMON.name: Demon Uni

ITEM_MAT_UNI_KING.description: A giant Uni created by selective breeding. The giant thorns can also be used as a building material.
ITEM_MAT_UNI_KING.name: Emperor Uni

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_RED.description: A flower that can easily be found on roadsides, but it contains components that can be used as ingredients for medicines.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_RED.name: Health Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_BLUE.description: A poisonous blue flower growing in all areas of Roteswasser Kingdom.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_BLUE.name: Northern Wind Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_YELLOW.description: A poisonous yellow flower growing in all areas of Roteswasser Kingdom.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_YELLOW.name: Sunny Honey Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_SHABON.description: A plant that releases mysterious bubbles that look like soap bubbles. The purpose of these bubbles is unknown.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_SHABON.name: Bubble Grass

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_GLASS.description: A three-colored flower that shines like stained glass if light is cast on it. It's said to be the result of selective breeding.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_GLASS.name: Stained Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CAGE.description: A flower wrapped up by branches that stretch like a cage. The branches are so strong that picking the flower is next to impossible.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CAGE.name: Caged Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_PRINCESS.description: White flower that only lives near clean water. Its used to judge whether the water is safe for drinking.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_PRINCESS.name: Spring Princess

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_SCATTER.description: A flower that looks like its wrapped in flames. It's not on fire, but it takes courage to touch it.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_SCATTER.name: Soul Flower

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CRYSTAL.description: A clear resin-made ornament with a rose inside. It's a popular gift among women.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CRYSTAL.name: Rose Crystal

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_ROSE.description: A rose with a strong scent that blossoms in high places. By drying and smashing the flower, it produces an elegant perfume.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_ROSE.name: Delphi Rose

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CACTUS.description: A cactus that can survive even in harsh terrain. It contains a lot of liquid.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_CACTUS.name: Polar Cactus

ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_TIME.description: A flower that blossoms with the smallest amount of light. It releases pollen every hour, precisely.
ITEM_MAT_FLOWER_TIME.name: Timeteller

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_TONE.description: A plant that exists in the whole world. Its also used as a medicinal ingredient since old times.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_TONE.name: Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_LONGTONE.description: A tall taun that does not grow everywhere. It has more medicinal components than normal tones.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_LONGTONE.name: Tall Taun

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_YOUNG.description: Branches and leaves with some of the leaves mutated into flowers. It's said to have a certain effect as a medicinal ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_YOUNG.name: Sapling Branch

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_MOSS.description: Moss that adheres to rocks near the water. It's smashed and infused to be used as a medicine.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_MOSS.name: Medicinal Moss

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_FERTILIZER.description: Soil with a lot of nutrients. It's said to be excellent not only to grow plants but also as an alchemy ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_FERTILIZER.name: Fertile Soil

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_DRY.description: A dry flower that releases a strong scent. It seems to have almost no scent before it's dried.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_DRY.name: Dry Incense

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_BITTER.description: The root of a tree that is used as a medicinal ingredient. As the name suggests, it's very bitter.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_BITTER.name: Bitter Root

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_DEEP_RED.description: Red grass used as a medicinal ingredient and dyes. It's red throughout the year, regardless of the season or growth state.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_DEEP_RED.name: Crimson Grass

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_SECRET_OIL.description: An oil that oozes out from a certain soil. It's very sticky and hard to remove if it gets on your hands.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_SECRET_OIL.name: Earth's Secret Oils

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_HERMIT.description: A leaf with a high nutritional value. A sour juice using this leaf once became popular in the capital.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_HERMIT.name: Sage Grass

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_LIFE.description: A leaf used as an ingredient for first-aid medicines. It can be easily found on any high ground.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_LIFE.name: Life Leaf

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_REFURE.description: An expensive, rare, and highly effective medicinal ingredient. It's used for nobles and high-ranking people.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_REFURE.name: Refueling Extract

ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_YOUGDOR.description: Water that gushes out from a flower that grows in an area that humans cannot reach. It becomes a medicine when mixed with chemicals.
ITEM_MAT_MEDICAL_YOUGDOR.name: Yugdore Water

ITEM_MAT_POISON_GARBAGE.description: Foul-smelling garbage. Because it's harmful to human bodies, you can say it's poisonous in a way.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_GARBAGE.name: Stinky Trash

ITEM_MAT_POISON_POWDER.description: Spores released from giant mushrooms. They're not good for human bodies, so they're dangerous to inhale.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_POWDER.name: Mushroom Powder

ITEM_MAT_POISON_MISPEL.description: A seed filled with liquid. Each seed has a liquid with a different type of color and scent.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_MISPEL.name: Mispel Seed

ITEM_MAT_POISON_SCREAM.description: It makes a mysterious sound if you try to pull it from the ground. It's hard on the ears but causes no other harm.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_SCREAM.name: Resentful Scream

ITEM_MAT_POISON_BLESSING.description: A flower named to celebrate lies and falsehood. Because it's a common flower, the meaning of the name is unknown.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_BLESSING.name: Blessing of Delusion

ITEM_MAT_POISON_RYUSOURAN.description: A plant containing a deadly poison that kills giant dragons. When in bloom, it releases a sweet scent to attract prey.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_RYUSOURAN.name: Dragon Flower

ITEM_MAT_POISON_DEMONBLOOD.description: Crystallized blood. A hard-to-handle material that becomes an excellent medicine and also a poison, depending on the intake amount.
ITEM_MAT_POISON_DEMONBLOOD.name: Demon Blood

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_SAGE.description: An all-purpose plant that can be fully used as medicinal ingredients. Just infuse it and drink it to feel the effect.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_SAGE.name: Forest Sage

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_HEAVEN.description: Water trapped inside ice that occasionally falls along with the rain. It's known as tears of celestial beings.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_HEAVEN.name: Amamiya's Tears

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_SUN.description: An extravagant flower that looks like a vibrant sun. Its habitat and cultivation method are all unknown.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_SUN.name: Solflower

ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_DONKERUHAITO.description: A flower with a powerful medicinal effect. Even someone on the verge of death can quickly recover enough to get back on their feet.
ITEM_MAT_ELIXIL_DONKERUHAITO.name: Dunkelheit

ITEM_MAT_SAND_SOFT.description: A clay-like soft sand with a reddish color. Often used to make ceramics and soil.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_SOFT.name: Soft Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_BURN.description: Sand that can be obtained by breaking rocks. It flares up if in contact with fire.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_BURN.name: Burning Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_CORAL.description: Finely smashed coral fragments. Because they're so fine, they may look like sand if not observed carefully.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_CORAL.name: Corail Saber

ITEM_MAT_SAND_POLLUTION.description: Leaf mold that comes from poisonous plants. Obviously, nothing grows from this.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_POLLUTION.name: Polluted Humus

ITEM_MAT_SAND_EMERALD.description: Soil mixed with extremely fine glassy stones. Often found along with other ore.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_EMERALD.name: Emerald Glass

ITEM_MAT_SAND_WATER.description: Soil from the bottom of the water that contains nutrients from various organisms. The presence of this soil is proof that the area is clean.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_WATER.name: Seafloor Soil

ITEM_MAT_SAND_BLACK.description: A mud lump. Because it contains many components, it's an ideal alchemy ingredient, but the texture and smell are horrible.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_BLACK.name: Black Muck

ITEM_MAT_SAND_SWIRLING.description: Sand that flies around magnetic rocks. It's possible to strengthen the magnetism by processing it.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_SWIRLING.name: Vortex Sand

ITEM_MAT_SAND_GLITTER.description: A collection of glittering sand. Look closely and you can see the grains are star-shaped.
ITEM_MAT_SAND_GLITTER.name: Glittering Sand

ITEM_MAT_STONE_DAMAGED.description: Abandoned and weathered brittle stone. It should go back to normal through alchemy processing.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_DAMAGED.name: Eroded Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_SWEET.description: A rock whose sweetness spreads through your mouth if you lick it. The mystery of the sweetness remains unsolved.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_SWEET.name: Nectar Rock

ITEM_MAT_STONE_HAZE.description: A type of ore that was given this name because it becomes cloudy when soaked in acid.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_HAZE.name: Nepheline

ITEM_MAT_STONE_MOSS.description: A stone covered in moss found near beaches and rivers. It's a common sight anywhere you go.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_MOSS.name: Waterside Moss Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_SPIRIT.description: An incandescent stone that can be extracted from meteorites. It does not contain any special spiritual force.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_SPIRIT.name: Ethereal Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_ANCIENT.description: A stone used for pillars of buildings in the ancient past. It's well shaped and easy to be reused.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_ANCIENT.name: Ancient Pillar

ITEM_MAT_STONE_CORAL.description: Coral that has become a fossil over a long period. At first glance, it looks like an ordinary stone.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_CORAL.name: Coral Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_BREEZE.description: An ore with the power of the wind. When struck and cracked, it releases a wind that is as strong as the impact received.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_BREEZE.name: Breeze Stone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_RIVER.description: A green and yellow stone. It has bolt and air elements and is highly valued in alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_RIVER.name: Riverstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_RIVER_BLUEFLAME.description: A red and blue stone. Despite having the power of fire and ice, it's only used as an ornament outside alchemy.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_RIVER_BLUEFLAME.name: Blue Flame Riverstone

ITEM_MAT_STONE_HEAT.description: Niter containing heat. While the niter absorbs heat, it emits high-temperature heat.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_HEAT.name: Hot Saltpeter

ITEM_MAT_STONE_ARKNIGHT.description: An ore with magical powers. It's harder than it looks, which makes it a little difficult to process.
ITEM_MAT_STONE_ARKNIGHT.name: Arknite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_SEKINETU.description: It still glows red due to the heat that is still smoldering inside, and it may spontaneously ignite, occasionally.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_SEKINETU.name: Crimson Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_AQUA.description: It often has high-purity crystals that take all the heat away, so gloves are essential when touching it.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_AQUA.name: Aqua Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_INAZUMA.description: An ore with the power of lightning. It's said to be the result of a transformation caused by lightning.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_INAZUMA.name: Lightning Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_VINT.description: An ore with stripes that look like an undulating wind. It emits a light-green glow when the wind hits it.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_VINT.name: Wind Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_AMATAITO.description: The most famous and common stone in the world. Its properties allow it to mix together with other metals.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_AMATAITO.name: Amatite Ore

ITEM_MAT_ORE_YAKOU.description: An one that looks like a common stone during the day, but at night, it shines dimly.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_YAKOU.name: Luminous Rock

ITEM_MAT_ORE_PENT.description: A dark and plain ore. It's commonly used to make armors, but its weakness is being rather heavy.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_PENT.name: Pentanite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_MORUDY.description: Milky white ore with high hardness. When polished, it's dealt with as an expensive jewel.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_MORUDY.name: Mordenite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_GOLDY.description: A golden ore, but it's not gold. When mixed with other metals, it becomes extremely hard.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_GOLDY.name: Goldinite

ITEM_MAT_ORE_SOUSEI.description: A white and gold ore. It's possible to split the colors by hitting it with a powerful impact.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_SOUSEI.name: Degenesis Stone

ITEM_MAT_ORE_SEPUTO.description: A transparent ore with seven colors of light inside. Its strength sets it apart from other ores.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_SEPUTO.name: Septrin

ITEM_MAT_ORE_ADAMANT.description: An ore encasing a jewel. Because of its extraordinary hardness, taking the jewel out is next to impossible.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_ADAMANT.name: Adamant

ITEM_MAT_ORE_ETERNAL.description: A mysterious crystal that can only be smashed, shaved and melted after alchemy techniques are applied.
ITEM_MAT_ORE_ETERNAL.name: Eternal Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SMALL.description: A fragment of a crystal-like transparent stone. Sometimes jewels are also mixed up in it.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SMALL.name: Small Crystals

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_UNIDENTIFIED.description: Raw ore that is no longer recognizable after so many substances have been mixed in with the original ore.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_UNIDENTIFIED.name: Unknown Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_CORAL.description: Coral that emits light underwater. If processed well as an ornament, it's traded at a very high price.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_CORAL.name: Glowing Coral

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_WHITE.description: A rare, white bead that can be found in giant clams. It's traded at the same value as a jewel.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_WHITE.name: White Shell Pearl

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_BLACK.description: A super rare black bead that can be found in giant clams. It's more rare and valuable than the white ones.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_BLACK.name: Black Shell Pearl

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_AMBER_FRAGMENT.description: A small fragment of amber. Because of its cheap price, it can be used liberally as an alchemy ingredient.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_AMBER_FRAGMENT.name: Amber Fragment

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_AMBER.description: Amber with insects and plants mixed inside. It's said to be more valuable than transparent ones.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_AMBER.name: Amber Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_THREE.description: Ore with layers of different colors. Because the properties change with the colors, it's difficult to handle.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_THREE.name: Three-Colored Stone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_CLEAR.description: Crystal that is created from the accumulation of solidified components sucked up by the trees from the ground.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_CLEAR.name: Clear Branch

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_HOLY.description: A liquid substance that was sucked up by big trees' roots and crystallized at the branches.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_HOLY.name: Holy Arbor Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_ALIEN_WORLD.description: Ore that can be obtained in the underworld. A crystal that, like the land, was contaminated by the Philuscha and, therefore, is harmful to the human body.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_ALIEN_WORLD.name: Underworld Crystal

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SHINING.description: A shiny black ore. It breaks easily, but if processed, it hardens and even becomes jewels.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SHINING.name: Black Glitter Stone

ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SEVEN.description: Raw ore that can show different colors when processed. It's traded at a very high price.
ITEM_MAT_GEMSTONE_SEVEN.name: Rainbow Gemstone

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_DRY.description: Finely crushed wood chips. Extremely light and, if scattered on the ground and ignited, can cause a dust explosion.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_DRY.name: Dried Lumber

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_FLINT.description: A ball of pepper that has hardened like a stone. While convenient to be transported, it's too hard and difficult to shave.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_FLINT.name: Flint Pepper

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_KAZURA.description: A plant with seeds inside its body. It explodes with the impact of a bomb and scatters the seeds kept inside.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_KAZURA.name: Explosive Vine

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_HOMURA.description: Black sand that completely burns out with a lot of smoke just by getting it close to fire.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_HOMURA.name: Flaming Black Sand

ITEM_MAT_POWDER_MAGUMA.description: Lava ore crushed and turned into powder. If blown by the wind, it certainly causes a great disaster.
ITEM_MAT_POWDER_MAGUMA.name: Magma Powder

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_PAPER.description: Basically, it can only be burned, but since paper is a relatively precious item, it's not garbage.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_PAPER.name: Scrap Paper

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_BARK.description: Bark that was scraped from a tree. It's dry and burns well, so it's often used as a fuel substitute.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_BARK.name: Flammable Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_PALMA.description: Bark that was scraped from Palma trees. It burns more easily than common bark.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_PALMA.name: Palma Bark

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_COCONUT.description: Coconut that often grows in wetlands. While its oil has many applications, it does not taste too good.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_COCONUT.name: Fuel Coconut

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_NATURE.description: Oil extracted from plants. It's often used for cooking and is said to be healthier than oil of animal origin.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_NATURE.name: Natural Oil

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_AMBER.description: Amber-colored high-quality oil. A super luxurious item that was extracted over many years from the rocks in a cave.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_AMBER.name: Amber Oil

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_FLAME_ICE.description: Ice crystals that release flames. It's hot when close to the hand, but when squeezed, the heat disappears and becomes cold.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_FLAME_ICE.name: Fire and Ice Crystal

ITEM_MAT_FUEL_ETERNAL.description: An extremely rare type of fuel that is called the flame that burns forever.
ITEM_MAT_FUEL_ETERNAL.name: Eternal Fire

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_BEAST.description: Meat obtained from beasts, as the name implies. It's completely blood-free and pre-processed.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_BEAST.name: Beast Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_FRESH.description: Livestock meat raised for food. Meats of not only beasts but also of monsters have appeared in the market.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_FRESH.name: Fresh Meat

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_EGG.description: A mysterious egg. Since most of the eggs laying around are unfertilized, the eternal mystery continues.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_EGG.name: Some Kind of Egg

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_OIL.description: A nut made of an oil-like substance. When smashed and squeezed, it produces a large volume of oil.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_OIL.name: Oil Tree Fruit

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_SWEET.description: A fruit known as a present from the heavens. Extremely sweet and enjoyed by all ages.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_SWEET.name: Nectar Fruit

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_POTATO.description: Wild potatoes that grow naturally anywhere. The taste may disappoint, but at least it's edible.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_POTATO.name: Wild Potato

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_BEANS.description: Beans found in the forests. While highly nutritious, it may be too eccentric for quite a lot of people.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_BEANS.name: Portpea

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_RED.description: A nut with devilish spiciness. It's loved by super spicy food fans, but most people do not even try it.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_RED.name: Red Devil

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_KURENOKO.description: Plant buds that grow from the ground. They are edible, but after they grow and peel, they can no longer be eaten.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_KURENOKO.name: Clenoko

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_APPLE.description: An apple that is said to be the most delicious in the world. It contains a lot of juice as if it was a drink.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_APPLE.name: Red King Apple

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_PUMPKIN.description: A product made through selective breeding and used as a festival ornament in a certain area. It tastes the same as a normal pumpkin.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_PUMPKIN.name: Skull Pumpkin

ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_VENOM.description: A fruit with a fascinating sweetness. However, that sweetness is a poisonous component, so overeating it may be life-threatening.
ITEM_MAT_FOODSTUFF_VENOM.name: Venom Nut

ITEM_MAT_NUT_PALMA.description: The interior of the hard shell is filled with sweet juice, and it's enjoyed by adults and children alike as a beverage.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_PALMA.name: Palma Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_FRESS.description: A type of wild strawberry. They're very acidic, but become sweeter if smashed and heated.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_FRESS.name: Fresh Berry

ITEM_MAT_NUT_WERDER.description: A highly nutritious nut. Because of its high amount of oil, it's most commonly found processed and turned into oil.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_WERDER.name: Werder Nut

ITEM_MAT_NUT_KUKEN.description: A tomato that is a specialty of Kurken Island. Fresh products are so sweet that they are seen as fruit.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_KUKEN.name: Kurken Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_FORTUNE.description: The same tree produces fruit with three different tastes, so it's impossible to know the taste until you try it.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_FORTUNE.name: Fortune Fruit

ITEM_MAT_NUT_GRAPE.description: A grapevine that bears seven-colored grapes. It can be eaten as is, but it's also often used as a dye.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_GRAPE.name: Rainbow Grapevine

ITEM_MAT_NUT_SUMMER.description: A sweet and sour fruit. A unique fruit that has not only a square body but square seeds as well.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_SUMMER.name: Summer Gem

ITEM_MAT_NUT_SOFT.description: A fruit that tastes like fresh cream. The disadvantage is that it has a fluffy texture, so it goes bad easily.
ITEM_MAT_NUT_SOFT.name: Softtail

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_NORMAL.description: A beehive with sweet honey stored. It's possible to get honey and bee larvae from it.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_NORMAL.name: Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_SILVER.description: A silvery beehive. It produces gray honey with a higher nutritional value than common honey.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_SILVER.name: Silver Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_GORD.description: A legendary golden beehive. The beehive itself is made of honey.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_GORD.name: Gold Beehive

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_BEEHIVE.description: A beehive with a three-level structure. The honey at the core is the most nutritious, but it tastes bitter.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_BEEHIVE.name: Bee Haven

ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_BALL.description: Multiple spherical beehives bundled together. It has holes in all directions for worker bees to go in and out.
ITEM_MAT_BEEHIVE_BALL.name: Honey Ball

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_AIHE.description: A mushroom that spreads its roots on Eiche. Just grill it and it tastes great.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_AIHE.name: Eicheloa

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GUNTAI.description: A cluster of mushrooms that grow from a single place. As individual mushrooms, they fall behind in terms of both nutrition and taste.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GUNTAI.name: Mushroom Colony

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_BRODEN.description: A mushroom with its cap folded. Its cap unfolds quickly when it senses water.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_BRODEN.name: Brodenbits

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_YUPITO.description: A type of mushroom that is much larger than others. It requires something like an axe to harvest it.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_YUPITO.name: Utopiechampignon

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_KURAGE.description: A rare mushroom that grows underwater. It has a jelly-like texture and is mostly made of water.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_KURAGE.name: Jellyfish Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_KOCHIKAKE.description: A mushroom so giant that people could sit on it. In reality, however, it has no strength, so people cannot sit on it.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_KOCHIKAKE.name: Stool of Nature

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_YORU.description: A mushroom named because of its dark blue like the night sky and because the speckled pattern looked like a lady.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_YORU.name: Dusk Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GEKI.description: A super extreme mushroom with a reproductive power so high that it can fully cover a piece of land shortly after it starts to grow.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GEKI.name: Danger Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_HOUSYOU.description: A mushroom whose cap is made of crystal. The cap is very hard and not edible, but it can be used for decoration.
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_HOUSYOU.name: Jewel Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GOLDEN.description: A mushroom whose tip looks like a crown. Some people call it the 'king mushroom.'
ITEM_MAT_MUSHROOM_GOLDEN.name: Golden Crown

ITEM_MAT_FISH_SARUDIN.description: Freshwater fish that lives in areas surrounded by rivers and lakes. A common fish that can be caught pretty much anywhere.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_SARUDIN.name: Sardine

ITEM_MAT_FISH_SERIYORU.description: A large fish that often appears on dining tables. It's consumed in pretty much every region.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_SERIYORU.name: Seriole

ITEM_MAT_FISH_PURUMURU.description: A shellfish that can be found relatively easy at sandy beaches. It only needs to be grilled to taste good.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_PURUMURU.name: Pourpremoule

ITEM_MAT_FISH_SYURABU.description: A small crab that inhabits sandy beaches and sea shores. A dangerous animal with sharp pincers on its body.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_SYURABU.name: Crab

ITEM_MAT_FISH_SHELL.description: Seashells washed ashore on sandy beaches. They can be used for decoration and as alchemy ingredients.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_SHELL.name: Pretty Shells

ITEM_MAT_FISH_TOGE.description: A fish that is normally round-shaped, but when surrounded by enemies, it expands its entire body to protect itself with thorns.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_TOGE.name: Spikey

ITEM_MAT_FISH_HITODE.description: A starfish with multiple thorns on its back. Because of its resemblance with Uni, it gained this name.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_HITODE.name: Uni Starfish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_KURI.description: A subspecies of Uni. Because it's a type of sea creature, it can be caught in seawater.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_KURI.name: Chestnut

ITEM_MAT_FISH_NIJI.description: A fish with rainbow-like scales. When swimming as a school, they look like a giant rainbow swimming.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_NIJI.name: Rainbow Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_MACE.description: A giant fish with a hard skull and a hammer-like shape. It's ferocious and does not taste too good.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_MACE.name: Mace Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_STIN.description: A giant fish with wing-like fins. Despite its kind smile, it's rather ferocious.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_STIN.name: Stingray

ITEM_MAT_FISH_MANNEN.description: A fish that has not changed its appearance since tens of thousands of years ago. It's considered an endangered species.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_MANNEN.name: Myria Fish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_NUSHI.description: A fish that is said to live in the deepest depths of the lakes. It's called the lake master, but in reality, there are many of this species.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_NUSHI.name: Lake Master

ITEM_MAT_FISH_RYUGU.description: A nautilus with a large and beautiful spiral shell on its back. It's used as a jewel ornament.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_RYUGU.name: Dragonpalace Nautilus

ITEM_MAT_FISH_KING.description: A turban shell shaped like a crown. It can be grilled and eaten.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_KING.name: Crown Shellfish

ITEM_MAT_FISH_EMPEROR.description: A rare fish that inhabits waterfronts deep inside ruins. An endangered species that tastes very good if simmered.
ITEM_MAT_FISH_EMPEROR.name: Imperial Fish

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_NANAHOSHI.description: An insect with a pattern of seven stars on its back. It's said to be active during the night.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_NANAHOSHI.name: Seven Stars

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_HONEY.description: An ant that stores sweet nectar in its body to transport it. For adventurers, it's a snack to replenish sugar.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_HONEY.name: Honey Ant

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_IKKAKU.description: A grasshopper with horns on its head. With these hard horns, it can flick away the opponent in a fight.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_IKKAKU.name: Narwhal Grasshopper

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_HOTARU.description: An insect that flies with its strangely inflated tail shining like a lantern.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_HOTARU.name: Lantern Fly

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_BEE.description: A bee with a rose red part. Its carnivorous and has a poison strong enough to kill small animals.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_BEE.name: Rose Bee

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_KABUTO.description: A giant insect with its entire body wrapped by a strong shell. It stays nonchalant if taunted by kids.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_KABUTO.name: Giant Beetle

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_BEBY.description: A dragon-looking insect. While its appearance may mislead many people, it's actually just an insect.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_BEBY.name: Baby Wyrm

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_CRIMSON.description: A mantis with feathers that look like a red cloak. Contrary to its appearance, it's surprisingly friendly.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_CRIMSON.name: Crimson Cloak

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_SPIRIT.description: An insect that only inhabits places where no light can reach, such as the bottom of rivers and depths of ruins.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_SPIRIT.name: Spirit Isopod

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_AMBER.description: An insect with a body that looks like a jewel. It has absolutely no value as a jewel.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_AMBER.name: Amber Fly

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_LAPIS.description: A butterfly with deep blue feathers. The feathers have a composition close to glass and jewels.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_LAPIS.name: Lapis Papillion

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_TRY.description: A golden insect with three prominent horns. Despite its looks, it does not fight well against other insects.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_TRY.name: Trihorn

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_KING.description: An insect that has not changed its appearance since tens of thousands of years ago. It's sometimes dealt with as a type of jewel.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_KING.name: Ancient Bug

ITEM_MAT_INSECT_ROCK.description: A hermit crab that settles inside rocks. It opens holes on rocks to build their houses.
ITEM_MAT_INSECT_ROCK.name: Rock Schloss

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_THREAD.description: Giant and strong spider's thread. It can be pulled without breaking too easily.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_THREAD.name: Restraint Silk

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_COTTON.description: Grass that produces something like white fluff after blooming. With this white fluff, it's possible to make thread and cloth.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_COTTON.name: Cotton Grass

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_VINE.description: A vine plant that won't break even when you pull hard on it.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_VINE.name: Tough Vine

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_IVY.description: Ivy that lives for hundreds of years as a parasite that clings to large trees.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_IVY.name: Arbor Ivy

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_QUEEN.description: A web produced by a giant queen spider. It's very stiff, but it becomes a soft fiber if wet with water.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_QUEEN.name: Queen Spider Web

ITEM_MAT_THREAD_ARAKUNE.description: A thread ball made by a spider by wrapping its arms around it. It's now stiff.
ITEM_MAT_THREAD_ARAKUNE.name: Hug of Arachne

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_AIHE.description: A large tree that can be found anywhere. It's very hard and frequently used as a building material.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_AIHE.name: Eiche

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_DURABLE.description: A hard and thick log. It's so hard that even cutting it for lumber is a difficult task.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_DURABLE.name: Tough Log

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_MOSS.description: A log that stayed floating on the water for so long that it has been completely covered with moss.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_MOSS.name: Mossy Driftwood

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_HOLY.description: A broken branch of a giant tree called the sacred tree. It's so hard that it's nearly impossible to process it.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_HOLY.name: Holy Arbor Branch

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_PALMA.description: A tree that grows in warm areas like southern countries. It's said to produce terribly hard nuts.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_PALMA.name: Palma

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_FOSSIL.description: A dead tree that has petrified. It looks like a tree, but the texture is close to stone.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_FOSSIL.name: Fossil Tree

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_MIASMA.description: A fallen tree that continues to release miasma after absorbing nutrients from contaminated land.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_MIASMA.name: Miasma Log

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_THUNDER.description: A tree with lightning powers stored inside. It's said to have been directly struck by lightning.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_THUNDER.name: Lightning Tree

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_ANCIENT.description: A material that can be collected from ancient trees from tens of thousands of years ago. Very hard but can be used as firewood.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_ANCIENT.name: Ancient Log

ITEM_MAT_WOOD_SENNEN.description: A tree of the same variety as the big trees that are thousands of years old. A precious item that cannot be used for cheap things.
ITEM_MAT_WOOD_SENNEN.name: Millennial Tree

ITEM_MAT_GAS_WING.description: A plant with leaves that resemble bird wings. They are very light and are often carried around by the wind.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_WING.name: Wing Plant

ITEM_MAT_GAS_NOROSHI.description: A flower that continues to release a smoke signal. But actually, that smoke signal is not smoke but seeds that are dangerous if inhaled.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_NOROSHI.name: Smoke Signal Flower

ITEM_MAT_GAS_BURNT.description: A mushroom with a burnt appearance. It may cause a stomachache if eaten by mistake.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_BURNT.name: Crispy Mushroom

ITEM_MAT_GAS_BUBBLE.description: Bubble that can be obtained from bubble grass. It does not break easily if touched.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_BUBBLE.name: Sky Bubble

ITEM_MAT_GAS_POISON.description: A purple gas emitted by rotten trees. If inhaled by mistake, it causes discomfort for days.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_POISON.name: Rotwood Miasma

ITEM_MAT_GAS_AQUEOUS.description: A branch from a tree that makes its habitat underwater. The air created inside it is released from all over the branch.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_AQUEOUS.name: Water Holy Branch

ITEM_MAT_GAS_FIRE.description: A hot, fiery gas that is like the breath of a fire dragon. If unleashed indoors, it's sure to start a fire.
ITEM_MAT_GAS_FIRE.name: Dragon Breath

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_MAGIC.description: A fragment of a Fairystone. Because it's always shining, a lot of people use it to light their homes.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_MAGIC.name: Fairystone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_HOLY.description: A black crystal. They're called "Dark Crystals," but don't really have any dark powers.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_HOLY.name: Dark Crystal Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_DARKNESS.description: A crystal that shines blue and white. It has a little mystical power, but it's not a sacred power.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_DARKNESS.name: Holy Stone Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_RAINBOW.description: A fragment of animal that drank too much Duet Stock Solution and had its wings petrified.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_RAINBOW.name: Rainbow Wing Fragment

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_SHARD.description: A fragment of a book containing notes about various magical systems written by a famous magician.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_SHARD.name: Magic Tome Piece

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_BOOK.description: A book containing notes about various magical systems written by a famous magician. The book itself has magical powers.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_BOOK.name: Old Magic Tome

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_LEAF.description: A leaf from the branches of big trees that have crystals attached to them. It's just a leaf, but it has a mysterious power.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_LEAF.name: Holy Tree Leaf

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_SPHERE.description: A sphere reminiscent of a celestial body. It's heavy like stone, but it floats in the air when tossed.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_SPHERE.name: Mystic Sphere

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient creature. It contains shapes of creatures that cannot be found even in books.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_FOSSIL.name: Ancient Fossil

ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_BLOCK.description: A lump of ice that never melts even under the sun, or if thrown into fire.
ITEM_MAT_MYSTIC_BLOCK.name: Forever Ice Block

ITEM_MAT_METAL_IRON.description: A rusty piece of rotten iron. Obviously, it's useless in this condition.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_IRON.name: Decayed Iron Pieces

ITEM_MAT_METAL_RUST.description: A rusty and damaged sword. It's more useful to turn it into metallic material than to reforge it.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_RUST.name: Rusted Sword

ITEM_MAT_METAL_BEOKEN.description: A pile of broken everyday tools. It cannot be used as it is, but it can be recycled as material.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_BEOKEN.name: Broken Tools

ITEM_MAT_METAL_LIQUID.description: A metal that liquefies if heated. It's difficult to handle until you get used to it.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_LIQUID.name: Liquid Metal

ITEM_MAT_METAL_OLD.description: A sword used in the ancient past. It was made long before even when the Klint Kingdom came into existence.
ITEM_MAT_METAL_OLD.name: Ancient Sword

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_BULE.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Blue Puni, and the stone is also blue.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_BULE.name: Blue Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_GREEN.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Green Puni, and the stone is also green.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_GREEN.name: Green Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_RED.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Red Puni, and the stone is also red.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_RED.name: Red Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_BLACK.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Black Puni, and the stone is also black.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_BLACK.name: Black Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_SILVER.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Silver Puni, and the stone is also silver.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_SILVER.name: Silver Puniball

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_GOLD.description: A mysterious precious stone found in the body of a Puni. It was taken from the body of a Gold Puni, and the stone is also golden.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_GOLD.name: Gold Puniball

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FUR.description: Fur extracted from wild animals. It needs to be tanned before being processed.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FUR.name: Animal Hide

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_PHANTOM_FUR.description: Fur extracted from animals said to be mythical beasts. It's soft and has a good coat.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_PHANTOM_FUR.name: Mythical Hide

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BONE.description: A bone of a giant creature that must be several times larger than humans. It can be used as an ingredient for hard items.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BONE.name: Large Bone

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FOSSIL.description: A fossil of a creature much larger than humans. It's hard to determine how it looked based on the remaining bones.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FOSSIL.name: Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_A_BEAST_FOSSIL.description: Fossil bones of a water beast that inhabited the water in ancient times. Despite its large size, it's lightweight and strong.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_A_BEAST_FOSSIL.name: Water Beast Fossil

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_A_BEAST_SCALE.description: The scale of a water beast that came off while it was swimming fast. These beautiful scales are often found washed ashore.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_A_BEAST_SCALE.name: Water Beast Scale

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BAT.description: The wings of bats that nest in caves and ruins. They contain components that are toxic to humans.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BAT.name: Cave Bat Wing

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_NEST.description: An abandoned nest of a white swallow. It has a solid structure, with grass and pieces of wood skillfully knitted together.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_NEST.name: White Swallow's Nest

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_FILLET.description: A dorsal fin of a magical beast. It's edible if processed, but that takes a long time to do and requires a lot of technique.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_FILLET.name: Beast Fin

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_CRUSTACEAN.description: Hard shell of monsters. It can repel not only the claws and tusks of other monsters but also human weapons.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_CRUSTACEAN.name: Beast Shell

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_SCALE.description: It can be obtained from magical beasts with scales. It's thinner than shells but has many applications.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_D_BEAST_SCALE.name: Beast Scales

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIRD_WING.description: Large feather taken from a giant bird. Because they are many times larger than the feathers of normal birds, many items can be made with a single plume.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIRD_WING.name: Giant Bird Feather

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIRD_EGG.description: A big egg of a giant bird. They are valued widely because they are large, nutritious, and tasty.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIRD_EGG.name: Giant Bird Egg

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GOAT.description: Horns taken from goats that have reached the end of their life. There seems to be also a practice of using them as part of an amulet.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GOAT.name: Goat Horn

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DEMON_NAIL.description: Sharp claws of special magical beasts. Because it curses those who touch them, they need to be handled with care.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DEMON_NAIL.name: Demon Claws

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_WOOL.description: A material obtained from monster goats. It has better thermal insulation properties than normal goat fur and absorbs impact very well.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_WOOL.name: Fluffy Wool

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_NEEDLE.description: A thin needle used to inject venom. It has a small hole in its tip from which the venom is released.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_NEEDLE.name: Poison Needle

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_WINGS.description: A wyrm wing. Its thin and strong membrane is used as a material for high-end armor.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_WINGS.name: Dragon Wing

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_EGG.description: An egg laid by a dragon. It may be found in dragon nests.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_EGG.name: Dragon Egg

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_EYE.description: Dragon eyeballs that are said to have mysterious powers. Since there are only two per dragon, it's a precious material.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_EYE.name: Dragon Eye

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_BORN.description: The skull of a giant dragon. Giant dragon bones preserving their original shape are hard to find.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_BORN.name: Dragon Bone

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_MEAT.description: Dragon meat. It's said that whoever eats it becomes immortal, but in reality, this does not happen.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DRAGON_MEAT.name: Dragon Meat

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GUARDIAN.description: A hard outer shell peeled off from a stone golem. It's a special stone that protects from any attack.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GUARDIAN.name: Guardian Armor

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_SOUL.description: A spirit once held by a knight's ghost. They continued to hold onto it even after it became an evil spirit.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_SOUL.name: Heroic Spirit

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIG_PUNI.description: A huge Puniball. It has a very different size from the regularly eaten ones.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BIG_PUNI.name: Giant Puniball

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FAIRY.description: A horn decoration owned by leader fairies. The horns of adult fairies grow along with this decoration.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_FAIRY.name: Fairy Horn Adornment

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_HUGE_NAILS.description: Sharp monster claws. Getting struck by such huge claws probably means certain death.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_HUGE_NAILS.name: Giant Claws

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GOLEM.description: A part that corresponds to a golem's heart. It stores the power to move the golem.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_GOLEM.name: Golem Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_REVERSE_SCALE.description: The power of dragons is stored within. If a wyvern with this scale gets angry, that power is manifested.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_REVERSE_SCALE.name: Inverted Scale

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ETHER.description: A stone golem's power core. It's unimaginably more powerful than golem cores.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ETHER.name: Ether Core

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DEMON.description: An object dropped by monsters. For humans it's garbage, but it may be a treasure for monsters.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_DEMON.name: Imp's Lost Item

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ELEMENT.description: Something like a spirit that appeared from the body of a defeated monster. Its identity is still not clear.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ELEMENT.name: Elemental Force

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ROOT.description: The roots of many plants intertwined. Some parts have anabolized, and it's almost a single thread.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_ROOT.name: Twisted Thorns

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_LONG_NAILS.description: Curved and sharp monster claws. Being slashed by these things will certainly mean more than just an injury.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_LONG_NAILS.name: Curved Long Nails

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_COMB.description: The crest of running beasts. It has a special shape designed to minimize air resistance when they are running.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_COMB.name: Running Beast Crest

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_TAIL.description: The tail of a beast that changes its color according to its surroundings. It's said to change color even if cut off from its body.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_TAIL.name: Phantom Color Tail

ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BLADE.description: A sword that was made to hunt cryptids, but as its appearance suggests, it lacked power.
ITEM_MAT_DROPITEM_BLADE.name: Wolf Beast's Blade

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_DUET.description: A solvent for smooth joining Fairystones and glass. Not very pure when undiluted.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_DUET.name: Duet Stock Solution

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_CINTILLA.description: Ore that is required to manufacture hard glass. It can only be obtained in some areas of the Cleria region.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_CINTILLA.name: Scintilla Ore

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_LUJADA.description: A precious Fairystone that can only be found in a mining area of the Cleria region.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_LUJADA.name: Lujada's Fairystone

ITEM_MAT_PUNI_SAKURA.description: A mysterious ball found inside a Puni's body. It was taken from a Flower Puni and is cherry-red in color.
ITEM_MAT_PUNI_SAKURA.name: Pink Puniball

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_005.description: A giant Kurken Fruit. It has a thick skin and doesn't taste good, so it's not suitable for eating.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_005.name: Giant Kurken Fruit

ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_006.description: Ordinary cow's milk. Sometimes used as an ingredient in cooking.
ITEM_MAT_RESERVE_006.name: Cow Milk

ITEM_MAT_QUEST_001.description: A mysterious substance said to harbor the power of spirits.
ITEM_MAT_QUEST_001.name: Spirit Catalysts

ITEM_MAT_QUEST_002.description: A feather from the Guide Bird. Only those who respond to guidance can possess it.
ITEM_MAT_QUEST_002.name: Guiding Bird Feather

ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.description: A bag containing many uni and flammable powder. When tossed, a huge number of uni are scattered in the air.
ITEM_MIX_BAKU_UNI.name: Explosive Uni

ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.description: A bomb containing a huge number of thorns. When tossed, the thorns are dispersed in the air.
ITEM_MIX_CRAFT.name: Craft

ITEM_MIX_FLAME.description: A simple bomb filled with only powder and highly flammable materials.
ITEM_MIX_FLAME.name: Bomb

ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.description: A rectangular-shaped ice bomb. It's filled with a special type of ice that rapidly lowers the surrounding temperature.
ITEM_MIX_REFERUN.name: Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.description: A strongly magnetized sphere. The moment it bursts, it releases the power of lightning to its surroundings.
ITEM_MIX_PLAJIG.name: Plajig

ITEM_MIX_LUFT.description: A device that, when tossed, explodes and rapidly gathers the surrounding air, causing a gust.
ITEM_MIX_LUFT.name: Luft

ITEM_MIX_CRAFTTRIO.description: A bomb that assembles three crafts in one. It has a simple structure, but it's as effective as three crafts.
ITEM_MIX_CRAFTTRIO.name: Trio Craft

ITEM_MIX_ANEMO_FLAME.description: A flower-shaped Bomb. It got this shape to distract the enemies, but it can also be misleading.
ITEM_MIX_ANEMO_FLAME.name: Anemo Bomb

ITEM_MIX_MELT_REFERUN.description: A melting Ice Bomb. When held for too long, the container becomes all soaked.
ITEM_MIX_MELT_REFERUN.name: Melting Ice Bomb

ITEM_MIX_RIA_PLAJIG.description: Plajig with stabilized lightning inside its vacuum tube. It's adjusted to extract maximum power.
ITEM_MIX_RIA_PLAJIG.name: Lia Plajig

ITEM_MIX_EDEL_LUFT.description: A strong version of Luft. It was improved so that it can strengthen the wind power even further.
ITEM_MIX_EDEL_LUFT.name: Edle Luft

ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.description: A magic device that can reverse day and night.
ITEM_MIX_LUNA_LAMP.name: Lunar Lamp

ITEM_MIX_ASTROROSE.description: A powerful rose bomb. It's kept safely to avoid accidental explosions.
ITEM_MIX_ASTROROSE.name: Astro Rose

ITEM_MIX_LAVINEGE.description: A crystal with ice powers. It feels very cold just by holding it.
ITEM_MIX_LAVINEGE.name: Lavinage

ITEM_MIX_GRANZEIT.description: A powerful bomb. The user must keep a considerable distance to avoid getting hit.
ITEM_MIX_GRANZEIT.name: Grazeit

ITEM_MIX_HIMMEL_FEATHER.description: An item with strong wind powers. It's said to be strong enough to cause a storm.
ITEM_MIX_HIMMEL_FEATHER.name: Himmel Feather

ITEM_MIX_TABOO_ARCANEBOOK.description: A book that records secret techniques so powerful they are considered taboo.
ITEM_MIX_TABOO_ARCANEBOOK.name: Forbidden Spell Book

ITEM_MIX_ZWEI_RESONANCE.description: A bomb in the shape of a special energy that ensures the powers of fire and ice do not cancel each other out.
ITEM_MIX_ZWEI_RESONANCE.name: Zwei Resonance

ITEM_MIX_CROSS_JUDGMENT.description: Two spears with the power of wind and lightning. It's actually a bomb, but the shape of a spear makes it easier to be thrown.
ITEM_MIX_CROSS_JUDGMENT.name: Cross Judgement

ITEM_MIX_ACACIA_ORIGINAL.description: The origin of Acacia's Grimoire, which can invoke magic just by being opened.
ITEM_MIX_ACACIA_ORIGINAL.name: Sourcebook of Acacia

ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.description: A traditional pill made by processing a medicinal herb found on Kurken Island.
ITEM_MIX_GRASS_BEANS.name: Grass Beans

ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.description: A traditional food made with flour. It's made as a preserved food.
ITEM_MIX_DRY_BISCUIT.name: Dry Biscuit

ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.description: A miracle potion created by alchemy with the power of bringing back even a person in deep coma.
ITEM_MIX_NECTOR.name: Nectar

ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.description: A super powerful medicine capable of healing any kind of injury, diseases, and even death.
ITEM_MIX_ELIXIR.name: Elixir

ITEM_MIX_HERMIT_SALVE.description: An ointment that is said to have been made by a hermit who severed relationships with others. It has a strong grassy smell.
ITEM_MIX_HERMIT_SALVE.name: Hermit Ointment

ITEM_MIX_FAIRY_ELIXIR.description: An elixir that is said to communicate with the fairyland. It has a good herby smell.
ITEM_MIX_FAIRY_ELIXIR.name: Fairy Elixir

ITEM_MIX_SILENCE_MIST.description: A tool that can disperse a solution from medicinal herbs in the form of an mist.
ITEM_MIX_SILENCE_MIST.name: Mist of Silence

ITEM_MIX_GOLD_HEART.description: The greatest medicine that was given a golden heart, the certificate of exceptional efficacy. The apple inside is said to be decorative.
ITEM_MIX_GOLD_HEART.name: Golden Heart

ITEM_MIX_MYTHOLOGY_NECTOR.description: A super strong medicine made from nectar and elixir.
ITEM_MIX_MYTHOLOGY_NECTOR.name: Mythic Nectar

ITEM_MIX_ETERNAL_HOLYGRAIL.description: A medicine in a gorgeous chalice. It's immensely effective, but discarding the chalice is troublesome.
ITEM_MIX_ETERNAL_HOLYGRAIL.name: Eternal Holy Grail

ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.description: Refined oil extracted from fish. It has the power of clearing the mind when licked.
ITEM_MIX_FISH_OIL.name: Fish Oil

ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.description: A powder that makes people more war-prone. It's said to extract fighting instincts.
ITEM_MIX_WAR_POWDER.name: War Powder

ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.description: A harmonica that will convey your feelings and thoughts through its sound, which provides various enhancements.
ITEM_MIX_ENERGIANICA.name: Energianica

ITEM_MIX_FALSE_BOUQUET.description: It may look like a bouquet, but it's actually made of dangerous elements such as poisonous plants.
ITEM_MIX_FALSE_BOUQUET.name: Mystic Robe

ITEM_MIX_INFERIOR_PRISON.description: A tree branch that covers the outside of golden baskets. The branches are tightly intertwined to keep the basket trapped.
ITEM_MIX_INFERIOR_PRISON.name: Miracle Ebonyal

ITEM_MIX_HAZE_BREATH.description: A purely white glass bottle. It's filled with a white mist, which immediately wraps up the surroundings if the glass is broken.
ITEM_MIX_HAZE_BREATH.name: Astronomical Clock

ITEM_MIX_HORN.description: A common horn. Despite being ordinary, it's said that its sound can make any person excited.
ITEM_MIX_HORN.name: Fake Bouquet

ITEM_MIX_DEVIL_PAINTING.description: A drawing said to have been made by the devil. It gives the enemy the same kind of sorrow depicted in the drawing.
ITEM_MIX_DEVIL_PAINTING.name: Haze Breath

ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.description: Wings with mystical colors. Spread it over yourself to protect against all kinds of attacks.
ITEM_MIX_MYSTERIOUS_ROBE.name: Prison of Decline

ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.description: A medicine that gives incredible strength for a moment, but at the same time, it destroys overworked bodies.
ITEM_MIX_MIRACLE_DRUG_EBONYAL.name: Barbaric Horn Whistle

ITEM_MIX_ORIGIN_CLOCK.description: A mysterious hourglass. It's said to provide superior powers while the sand is falling.
ITEM_MIX_ORIGIN_CLOCK.name: Depiction of a Devil

ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.description: A watch that gives power to control time. It changes the flow of time by watching the movement of the stars.
ITEM_MIX_ASTRONOMICAL_CLOCK.name: Hourglass of Origin

ITEM_MIX_DISASTER_CANTERA.description: It's said that while this is lit, disaster will come to all foes and allies alike.
ITEM_MIX_DISASTER_CANTERA.name: Cantera of Calamity

ITEM_MIX_GODS_PRELUDE.description: A music box made based on the music said to have been played by gods.
ITEM_MIX_GODS_PRELUDE.name: Prelude of the Gods

ITEM_MIX_ABYSS_CALL.description: Handbell inspired by angels and devils. It gives different effects to allies and enemies.
ITEM_MIX_ABYSS_CALL.name: Call of Abyss

ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE_01.description: A gathering tool used to pick grass and flowers. It's more efficient than doing it by hand.
ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE_01.name: Grass Sickle

ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE_02.description: A grass sickle used to pick grass and flowers reinforced to be even easier to use.
ITEM_MIX_MOWING_SCYTHE_02.name: Silent Sickle

ITEM_MIX_PICKAXE_01.description: A gathering tool essential for making firewood as well as for collecting wood from trees.
ITEM_MIX_PICKAXE_01.name: Woodcutter's Axe

ITEM_MIX_PICKAXE_02.description: Woodcutter's Axe with finely adjusted wood-chopping sharpness and weight.
ITEM_MIX_PICKAXE_02.name: Golden Axe

ITEM_MIX_HAMMER_01.description: The ideal hammer for destroying rocks and crystals. It can be used as a gathering tool.
ITEM_MIX_HAMMER_01.name: Hammer

ITEM_MIX_HAMMER_02.description: An improved hammer with finely adjusted resistance, weight, and power.
ITEM_MIX_HAMMER_02.name: Ravage Hammer

ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD_01.description: A fishing rod for private use. It makes any person happy to have their own unique rod.
ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD_01.name: Fishing Rod

ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD_02.description: A fishing rod made after the rod that is said to have been used by old masters called fishing gods.
ITEM_MIX_FISHING_ROD_02.name: Divine Fishing Rod

ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT_01.description: A net that has been improved not only to catch insects but also underwater use.
ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT_01.name: Catcher's Net

ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT_02.description: An improved capturing net. The finest net that is easy to swing with the minimum amount of resistance.
ITEM_MIX_INSECT_REPELLENT_02.name: Master Catcher's Net

ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.description: Shoes that are so light and comfortable to move around in that it's said they harbor the spirit of winds.
ITEM_MIX_WIND_SHOES.name: Wind Shoes

ITEM_MIX_EMERALD_BAND.description: By stretching the rope of light from the jewel in the bracelet, it's possible to visit places that are normally inaccessible.
ITEM_MIX_EMERALD_BAND.name: Emerald Band

ITEM_MIX_AIR_DROPS.description: A candy that creates wind in the mouth while licking.
ITEM_MIX_AIR_DROPS.name: Air Drop

ITEM_MIX_SACRED_BEAST_BELL.description: A device that has been improved to summon cryptids. It's made to summon multiple types of beasts.
ITEM_MIX_SACRED_BEAST_BELL.name: Summoner's Bell

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_001.description: A basic medicine that often used in alchemy. A red liquid with good affinity with fire element materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_001.name: Red Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_002.description: A basic medicine that often used in alchemy. A blue liquid with good affinity with ice element materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_002.name: Blue Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_003.description: A basic medicine that often used in alchemy. A yellow liquid with good affinity with bolt element materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_003.name: Yellow Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_004.description: A basic medicine that often used in alchemy. A green liquid with good affinity with air element materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_004.name: Green Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_005.description: A basic medicine that often appears in the synthesis of alchemy. A universal neutralizer with good affinity with all types of materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_005.name: Rainbow Neutralizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_006.description: A sweet liquid that can be obtained from beehives. It can naturally be used as a cooking ingredient, as well as an alchemy ingredient.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_006.name: Honey

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_007.description: A syrup made from three types of fruit mixed together. It seems to be used quite often as a secret ingredient.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_007.name: Berry Syrup

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_008.description: A powder made by mashing Wasser wheat. It's used as an ingredient in many dishes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_008.name: Flour

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_009.description: A super spicy powder. It's not available everywhere, but some stores carry it as a medicine.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_009.name: Devil's Breath

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_010.description: A mysterious type of water that moves around by itself. It's said that its movement follows a law.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_010.name: Puppet Liquid

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_011.description: Incredibly pure water free from any kind of impurities. The best among all types of water.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_011.name: Super Pure Water

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_012.description: Portable drinking water trapped in a clear membrane. It can be carried for long periods.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_012.name: Traveler's Water Orb

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_013.description: An ingredient with medicinal components dried and powdered. Very bitter, but good for the body.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_013.name: Medica Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_014.description: Herbs dried and soaked in oil to extract their medicinal components even further.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_014.name: Doctor's Bottle

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_015.description: Sacred water blessed by God. If used as a medicinal ingredient, it may become more effective than with normal water.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_015.name: Holy Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_016.description: A poison sometimes referred to as the devil's water. If used as an ingredient, it can enhance the toxin and make an even more powerful poison.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_016.name: Taboo Drop

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_017.description: Paper made by alchemy. It's stronger than regular paper, and resistant to water and fire.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_017.name: Zettel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_018.description: The reinforced version of Zettel, the paper made by alchemy. It's water and dust resistant, allowing it to maintain its quality for a long time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_018.name: Reinforced Zettel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_019.description: A pearl that was obtained from a big shell, polished carefully, and made into a perfect jewel.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_019.name: Pearl Crystal

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_020.description: An item that was extracted from amber crystal, had its uneven parts removed, and was carefully polished.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_020.name: Amberlite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_021.description: A transparent light purple jewel. This color appears after the synthesis process.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_021.name: Spirinite

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_022.description: An emerald jewel made by joining emerald glass.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_022.name: Waking Emerald

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_023.description: A jewel made from rainbow gemstone. It was cut at the angle that it looks the most beautiful, then polished.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_023.name: Arc en Ciel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_024.description: A beautiful bead that fascinates and attracts onlookers. Inside its black glow, it has a rainbow-colored glitter.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_024.name: Dark Glittering Oval

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_025.description: Mainly used as a firelighter. It's environmentally friendly, made with natural materials.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_025.name: Nitro Chips

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_026.description: Gunpowder with elements of bolt. A mysterious powder that releases lightning when lit, instead of fire.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_026.name: Donour Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_027.description: A blueish-white ember that burns endlessly. It's more correct to consider it a gunpowder with the looks of an ember.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_027.name: Blue Flame Ember

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_028.description: Solid fuel made by mixing different types of oil. It does not burn intensely even when ignited.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_028.name: Mixing Oil

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_029.description: A convenient item that ignites just by being hit. Often used in trips and camping.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_029.name: Flint Charcoal

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_030.description: A small bin containing multicolored oil. It's commonly used as a dye.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_030.name: Colorful Oil

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_031.description: A frail burning ice. Because it's very hard to melt, it's frequently used to refrigerate food items.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_031.name: Solid Ice Fuel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_032.description: Wind and feathers swirling in a transparent water crystal.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_032.name: Feather Draft

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_033.description: A bar made by melting a lump of common ore, gathering only the metallic parts, and shaped.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_033.name: Ingot

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_034.description: An ingot that glows blue. Because of its extreme hardness, it's said to be hard to process.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_034.name: Startium

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_035.description: A black and white ingot with a metallic luster. The two colors are separated completely during the process.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_035.name: Creaminea

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_036.description: An ingot with a lavish golden gloss. It's sometimes mistaken for a golden bar.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_036.name: Goldoterion

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_037.description: A high-hardness ingot with a rainbow-colored gloss. A rare metal that is easy to process, despite being extremely hard.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_037.name: Grand Orgen

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_038.description: Fiber made by forcibly synthesizing both animal and vegetal fiber by alchemy.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_038.name: Alchemy Fibers

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_039.description: Thread material with excellent durability. It has a special property of absorbing sunlight, which keeps it always warm.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_039.name: Himmel Schulwa

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_040.description: Thread that is said to connect eternal times. It's said that no sharp tool can cut it apart.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_040.name: Eternal Firo

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_041.description: Cloth made by weaving various thread materials together. It can be used for all purposes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_041.name: Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_042.description: Cloth that is not a leather product but smells like it. Mainly made with materials obtained from monsters.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_042.name: Bestial Air

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_043.description: Magical cloth. Its luxurious colors and elegant fragrance are released by this magical power.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_043.name: Sorcery Rose

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_044.description: Slightly thick cloth. It's more frequently used to make armor than clothes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_044.name: Royal Cloth

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_045.description: The finest type of cloth. It's as strong as armor and yet is lightweight and easy to move in.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_045.name: Sage Coat

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_046.description: Animal leather tanned with Puniballs. For some reason, when its pigments fade, it becomes translucent.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_046.name: Puni Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_047.description: A luxurious material for leather armor that is more resistant and lighter than metal. It was made from the skin of all kinds of beasts and animals.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_047.name: Master Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_048.description: Leather made by mixing dragon materials and first-class oil. Even under this condition, it still preserves traces of the magical powers of dragons.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_048.name: Dread Leather

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_049.description: Blessed water. It has various properties and can be used in a wide range of applications.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_049.name: Grace Nero

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_050.description: One of the ultimate goals of alchemists. It's said to have the power to create all things in nature.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_050.name: Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_051.description: A failed philosopher's stone. It's hard to use because its energy is not as stable as that of a philosopher's stone.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_051.name: Olden Philosopher's Stone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_052.description: Crystallized honey. Its called a natural candy and has high nutritious value.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_052.name: Honey Crystal

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_053.description: A flower transparent like glass. A useful intermediary ingredient with high ice elements.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_053.name: Glass Flower

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_054.description: A crystal ball that contains the power of the wind. When you look inside, you can see storms and hurricanes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_054.name: Wind Crystal Ball

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_055.description: A crystal that grows with air. When it grows to a certain size, it becomes a grain of light and disappears.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_055.name: Growing Quartz

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_056.description: A small bottle containing the power of spirits. It's compatible with all elements.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_056.name: Spirit Bottle

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_057.description: A top-grade material made from four types of element cores. Useful in high-level synthesis.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_057.name: Crystal Element

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_058.description: Toxin diluted with water. If the correct amount is used, it can also be used as an ingredient for medicines.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_058.name: Poisonous Liquid

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_059.description: Various types of concentrated poisons. A poison that is dangerous just by opening the lid.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_059.name: The Grim Reaper

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_060.description: Powder used to polish metal and hard objects. It contains many fine grains invisible to the eye.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_060.name: Polishing Powder

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_061.description: Perfume made with Delphi rose. It's very popular among women in the capital.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_061.name: Rose Perfume

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_062.description: It contains the power of wind. When spun a little or hit by wind, it continues spinning for a very long time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_062.name: Spring Wind Pinwheel

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_063.description: A machine that uses the Luft wind to sprinkle liquid and mist. It has many applications depending on the adjustment.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_063.name: Luft Atomizer

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_064.description: A lantern that is said to be used in the Underworld. Its unique shape is said to be very famous in certain areas.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_064.name: Exotic Lantern

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_065.description: An ornament that preserves the scenery of the four seasons inside a dome. It allows you to enjoy your favorite season any time.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_065.name: Four Seasons Dome

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_066.description: Lumber that does not let much heat or cold air pass. It's a valuable material in house construction.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_066.name: Magna Mater

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_067.description: Sand used to polish detailed jewels. It contains diamond powder among other elements.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_067.name: Polishing Sand

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_068.description: Mottled stone. When brushed and polished, it acquires an elegant color.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_068.name: Marblestone

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_069.description: An eternal monolith that, literally, does not damage, no matter what happens or how much time passes.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_069.name: Eternal Monolith

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_070.description: It's said to be a plant seed, but the plant type is unknown until it grows.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_070.name: Plant Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_071.description: A plant seed. If planted in a field, for some reason, a stone-related thing starts to grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_071.name: Stone Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_072.description: A plant seed. If planted in a field, for some reason, a fire-related thing starts to grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_072.name: Fire Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_073.description: A plant seed. If planted in a field, for some reason, a water-related thing starts to grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_073.name: Water Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_074.description: A plant seed. If planted in a field, for some reason, a mystical thing starts to grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_074.name: Mystic Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_075.description: A plant seed. If planted in a field, for some reason, a poison-related thing starts to grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_075.name: Poison Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_076.description: What will grow depends on luck. If you are unlucky, a garbage-like thing may grow.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_076.name: Golden Seeds

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_077.description: A solvent with higher purity than that of Duet Stock Solution. Used to join Fairystones and glass.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_077.name: Duet Solvent Solution

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_078.description: A crystal of Fairystones with a special feature. It definitely has some secret power.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_078.name: Fairystone Compass

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_079.description: Glass plate made from scintilla ore. It's thick and does not break easily.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_079.name: Scintilla Glass

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_080.description: Crystal made by processing Lujada's Fairystone. It can be used as decoration and as a night light.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_080.name: Lujada Crystals

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_RESERVE_005.description: Goblet created for a competition. It was made to the standards of the Glasswork Guild.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_RESERVE_005.name: Glass Goblet

ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_RESERVE_006.description: Pendant created for a competition. It was made to the standards of the Fairystone Guild.
ITEM_MIX_MATERIAL_RESERVE_006.name: Fairystone Pendant

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_01.description: A mysterious key made by Ryza based on a recipe that popped up in her head.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_01.name: Hollow Key

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_02.description: A strange key born of the Hollow Key.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_02.name: The Starting Key

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_03.description: A key made by Ryza to open the closed castle gate.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_03.name: Castle Door Key

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_04.description: A key that can open the door to the central blockade area.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_04.name: Blockade Key

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_05.description: A key that contains the power of the dragon vein. Made to be absorbed into the Emil's Tablet.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_05.name: Key of Honor

ITEM_KEY_INNOCENT.description: A key that makes it possible to gather the maximum amount of power in the surroundings. It breaks after being used a few times.
ITEM_KEY_INNOCENT.name: Pristine Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_01.description: A key with a small red stone embedded.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_01.name: Red Stone Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_02.description: A key with a small blue stone embedded.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_02.name: Blue Stone Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_03.description: A key with a small yellow stone embedded.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_03.name: Yellow Stone Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_04.description: A key with a small green stone embedded.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_COMMON_04.name: Green Stone Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_01.description: A key decorated with a red stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_01.name: Red Iron Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_02.description: A key decorated with a blue stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_02.name: Blue Iron Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_03.description: A key decorated with a yellow stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_03.name: Orange Iron Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_04.description: A key decorated with a green stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_UNCOMMON_04.name: Jade Iron Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_RARE_01.description: A silver key decorated with a purple stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_RARE_01.name: White Silver Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_RARE_02.description: A golden key decorated with a red stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_RARE_02.name: Golden Key

ITEM_KEY_STONE_SPECIAL_01.description: A key decorated with a rainbow-colored stone.
ITEM_KEY_STONE_SPECIAL_01.name: Rainbow Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_01.description: A key decorated with small red feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_01.name: Red Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_02.description: A key decorated with small blue feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_02.name: Blue Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_03.description: A key decorated with small yellow feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_03.name: Light Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_04.description: A key decorated with small green feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_COMMON_04.name: Leaf Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_01.description: A key with a red feather-like decoration.
ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_01.name: Scarlet Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_02.description: A key with a blue feather-like decoration.
ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_02.name: Cloud Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_03.description: A key with a yellow feather-like decoration.
ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_03.name: Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_04.description: A key with a green feather-like decoration.
ITEM_KEY_WING_UNCOMMON_04.name: Tree Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_RARE_01.description: A key decorated with two bright red feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_RARE_01.name: Firebird Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_RARE_02.description: A key decorated with two black feathers.
ITEM_KEY_WING_RARE_02.name: Phoenix Key

ITEM_KEY_WING_SPECIAL_01.description: A key with multiple feathers. It's said to be very valuable.
ITEM_KEY_WING_SPECIAL_01.name: Phantom Wing Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_01.description: A key decorated with a red clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_01.name: Fire Gear Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_02.description: A key decorated with a blue clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_02.name: Water Gear Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_03.description: A key decorated with a yellow clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_03.name: Gear Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_04.description: A key decorated with a green clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_COMMON_04.name: Wind Gear Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_01.description: A golden key decorated with a cogwheel.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_01.name: Fire Clock Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_02.description: A blue key decorated with a cogwheel.
