ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_02.name: Water Clock Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_03.description: A sand-colored key decorated with a cogwheel.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_03.name: Hourglass Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_04.description: A green key decorated with a cogwheel.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_UNCOMMON_04.name: Gear Gimmick Key

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_RARE_01.description: A key with a clock that moves with multiple cogwheels. The hands of the clock move like those of a normal clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_RARE_01.name: Key to the Future

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_RARE_02.description: A key with a clock that moves with multiple cogwheels. The hands of the clock move in the opposite direction of those of a normal clock.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_RARE_02.name: Key to the Past

ITEM_KEY_GEAR_SPECIAL_01.description: A key with a clock that moves with multiple cogwheels. The hands of the clock mark the future and the past.
ITEM_KEY_GEAR_SPECIAL_01.name: Key of All Times

ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_01.description: A key with a stone representing a red star.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_01.name: Scarlet Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_02.description: A key with a stone representing a blue star.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_02.name: Dark Star Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_03.description: A key with a stone representing a yellow star.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_03.name: Bright Star Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_04.description: A key with a stone representing a green star.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_UNCOMMON_04.name: Meteor Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_RARE_01.description: A key decorated with stars and moons with sun-like colors.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_RARE_01.name: Great Heavens Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_RARE_02.description: A key decorated with stars and moons with moon-like colors.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_RARE_02.name: Moon Shadow Key

ITEM_KEY_STAR_SPECIAL_01.description: A key with a perfect starry sky-like decoration.
ITEM_KEY_STAR_SPECIAL_01.name: Soul Cradle Key

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_06.description: A key made by Ryza to open the correct door that leads to the Code of the Universe.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_06.name: Key of Truth

ITEM_KEY_MAIN_07.description: A key made by Ryza when she arrived at the Infinite Heart inside the Code of the Universe.
ITEM_KEY_MAIN_07.name: Key of the End

ITEM_KEY_RESERVE_003.description: A key made to open the doors of the palace, based on technology obtained in Sardonica.
ITEM_KEY_RESERVE_003.name: Shining Key

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_01.description: Since the peaceful life in Kurken Island does not require power, this was made with focus on style.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_01.name: Alchemist's Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_02.description: An alchemist's staff reinforced for fighting enemies in harsh adventures.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_02.name: Svate Rod

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_03.description: The staff Ryza used during her first adventure.  It looks the same, but it is incredible powerful.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_03.name: Celestial Seeker

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_04.description: The staff Ryza used last summer. An improved version that looks the same but was enhanced with advanced technology.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_04.name: Sparkling Reverie

ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_05.description: The most powerful staff made with the cream of alchemy, designed to put an end to the war of the people of the Age of God.
ITEM_WEAPON_REISA_05.name: Agnes Luce

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_01.description: Klaudia's favorite bow. An item without any special protrusion, but it is easy to use.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_01.name: Ciel Shoot

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_02.description: A bow that has higher shooting speed and accuracy than her favorite bow.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_02.name: Yale Soar

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_03.description: A bow that is transparent like crystal. It is rather heavy, which reduces recoil when shooting.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_03.name: Croiselt

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_04.description: The bow used by Klaudia last summer.  It looks the same, but its power has been enhanced.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_04.name: Astrumnox

ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_05.description: A bow that is light like air and shoots powerful arrows.  No living creature can survive an arrow shot with this.
ITEM_WEAPON_KLAU_05.name: Astral Regalia

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_01.description: Lent's favorite long sword. It is quite heavy and will deliver an undefendable blow.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_01.name: Smite Blade

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_02.description: A long sword that yields a special power. It releases an unusual aura.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_02.name: Sword of Rupture

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_03.description: The sword Lent was using four years ago. It looks the same, but it is incomparably more powerful.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_03.name: Lord Guardian

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_04.description: The sword Lent was using last summer. It has been finely adjusted to make it easier to use.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_04.name: Demon Ender

ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_05.description: A long sword used by Samuel in his mercenary days. A masterpiece made by a master swordsmith.
ITEM_WEAPON_LENT_05.name: Liese Divider

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_01.description: Twin swords with the length of knives. Easy to carry and ideal for quick maneuvers.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_01.name: Sharp Edge

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_02.description: After being reinforced, it gained considerable slashing and stabbing powers.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_02.name: Paradiera

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_03.description: Twin swords made with the moon as a motif. Their blades are cold as moonlight.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_03.name: Luna Solis

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_04.description: Twin swords used by Tao last summer. They've been improved to suit Tao's current strength.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_04.name: Amphisbaena

ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_05.description: It is a short sword and an axe, so they are not exactly twin swords, but they can be used as such without any problem.
ITEM_WEAPON_TAO_05.name: Ifestio

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_01.description: A special sword with a hilt and blade of almost the same length.  It is hard to handle and not used by many people.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_01.name: Aristoclite

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_02.description: A long-hilt-sword with improved sharpness. Its power is demonstrated when used by a master.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_02.name: Herzog

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_03.description: A long-hilt-sword with a jagged blade. A terrifying sword that leaves horrible wounds.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_03.name: Might of Heaven

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_04.description: A long-hilt-sword that Patty used to use. Its sharpness and strength remain the same, but it is now easier to handle.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_04.name: Edel Schwert

ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_05.description: Sword that lies between a long sword and a long-hilt-sword. With the use of centrifugal force, even short people can use it.
ITEM_WEAPON_PATRICIA_05.name: Efflorescence

ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_01.description: A short staff with excellent maneuverability and sturdiness that is used for self-defense rather than as a weapon.
ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_01.name: Wise Wand

ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_02.description: A short staff that can be used both for self-defense and as a weapon. The thorn at the tip is unusually pointed.
ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_02.name: Educator

ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_03.description: An enhanced version of the short staff formerly used by Empel. It feels light like air when handling.
ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_03.name: Occult Wisdom

ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_04.description: A short staff that can be used for thrusting and slashing. It is powerful enough to crush enemy's ordinary swords and axes.
ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_04.name: Nachfolger

ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_05.description: The magic power of connected crystals is constantly flowing, enhancing the power of this short staff.
ITEM_WEAPON_AMPEL_05.name: Genesis Staff

ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_01.description: Lila's claws. A weapon made not for scratching but for ripping up.
ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_01.name: Trisker

ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_02.description: With simple improvement, its slicing power was successfully enhanced.
ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_02.name: Aurora

ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_03.description: Claws that Lila used to use.  An enhanced version made with a stronger material.
ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_03.name: Oren Herald

ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_04.description: Claws made after dragon scales and nails.  It can slice anything.
ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_04.name: Ventiska

ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_05.description: Claws with a porcelain texture. Valuable both as a weapon and a fine piece of art.
ITEM_WEAPON_LILA_05.name: Nevernoche

ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_01.description: A one-handed sword used by Bos. It is a mass-produced item, but is used by many due to its sturdiness.
ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_01.name: Onyx Blade

ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_02.description: A sword with a deep-red blade. Made with a metal that looks blood-stained.
ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_02.name: Lysil Edge

ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_03.description: A single-edged long sword. Because of its unusually hard blade, a blow with the back side of the blade has the same power.
ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_03.name: Baron's Light

ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_04.description: A double-blade long sword. Its sharp crystal-like blade can easily slice rocks.
ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_04.name: Unfold

ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_05.description: A legendary sword that is said to have sliced many enemies in the hands of a noble warrior in ancient past.
ITEM_WEAPON_BOS_05.name: Lost Alucard

ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_01.description: An iron folding-fan. A weapon that can be used as an iron pipe when folded and as a sharp blade when open.
ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_01.name: Iron Fan

ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_02.description: An iron folding-fan with a cherry-blossom-colored fabric attached. It can make enemies put off their guard with its looks.
ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_02.name: Purple Orchid

ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_03.description: A fine-looking iron folding-fan that could be owned by upper-class people. Sturdy, but very light.
ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_03.name: Scarlet Heaven

ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_04.description: A green iron folding-fan. Its structure allows it to be used not only to cut and hit but also be thrown.
ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_04.name: Jing Qing Fan

ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_05.description: An iron folding-fan with Lamberti Family's crest. Born from the combination of craftsmanship and alchemy.
ITEM_WEAPON_FEDERICA_05.name: Shrine Maiden's Dance

ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_01.description: A large axe. Rather than slice enemies, it was designed to crush them with its power and weight.
ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_01.name: Wild Axe

ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_02.description: An axe that has the color of blood to begin with, but unlearned people often get the wrong idea.
ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_02.name: Daybreak

ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_03.description: It was made by enlarging the blade of an axe to make it much more powerful.
ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_03.name: Estacado

ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_04.description: A battle axe that is said to have been used by knights of a powerful kingdom. It can slice enemies with the blade on both sides or stab them.
ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_04.name: Elde Divide

ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_05.description: An axe mainly made with bones. This battle axe made with dragon bones can crush almost anything.
ITEM_WEAPON_DIAN_05.name: Diamantis

ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_01.description: A war hammer with a heavy tip. Being struck with this must be horrific.
ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_01.name: Moon Quake

ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_02.description: A war hammer with the same hardness but slightly lighter for better handling.
ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_02.name: Crepusclype

ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_03.description: A thorny war hammer. I think this item requires no further explanation.
ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_03.name: Gravimarius

ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_04.description: A war hammer with an unusual shape. The opposite side of the flat part is just stylish.
ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_04.name: Elder Lily

ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_05.description: A war hammer made with rare materials. It does not look like a hammer because of it's unique shape.
ITEM_WEAPON_KALA_05.name: Raventoad

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_001.description: A wand with enhanced parts that yield a special power. It must be useful in adventures.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_001.name: Mistral Cane

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_002.description: A bow that yields a special power. The power inside it is mysterious.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_002.name: Etoile Filant

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_003.description: A long sword with a red blade. It was made focused on being simply powerful.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_003.name: Hashbringer

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_004.description: Twin swords that yield a special power. They can also be thrown as spinning swords.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_004.name: Vita Reaper

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_005.description: A long-hilt-sword that yields a special power. The blade is covered, but...
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_005.name: Folklore

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_006.description: A short staff that yields a special power. It is decorated with birds.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_006.name: Windword

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_007.description: Claws that yield a special power. They got bigger because of the armor.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_007.name: Crimson Mist

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_008.description: A one-handed sword that yields a special power. Countless small swords are attached.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_008.name: Void Punisher

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_009.description: An iron folding-fan that yields a special power. The edge is sharp as a blade.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_009.name: Self-defense Fans

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_010.description: A battle axe that yields a special power. A new blade has been added.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_010.name: Brute Veil

ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_011.description: A war hammer that yields a special power. It looks like it is not useful for normal hitting attacks.
ITEM_WEAPON_RESERVE_011.name: Solmarkt

ITEM_ARMOR_001.description: Clothes worn by rich and noble people. Not commonly seen on Kurken Island.
ITEM_ARMOR_001.name: Noble Tunic

ITEM_ARMOR_002.description: Leather armor with exceptional versatility that's easy to move in. It's made to protect only the vital parts of the body.
ITEM_ARMOR_002.name: Leather Protector

ITEM_ARMOR_003.description: Armor made by combining the bones of beasts and monsters together. It's quite durable but not very pleasant to wear.
ITEM_ARMOR_003.name: Bone Armor

ITEM_ARMOR_004.description: A robe made for mages. It's made of a thick fabric that provides good protection but is still easy to move around in.
ITEM_ARMOR_004.name: Mage's Robe

ITEM_ARMOR_005.description: A cuirass that has been used for a long time. Still worn by low-ranked soldiers.
ITEM_ARMOR_005.name: Soldier's Cuirass

ITEM_ARMOR_006.description: Alloy-made bulky armor. So easy to make that even blacksmith apprentices can mass produce it.
ITEM_ARMOR_006.name: Radiant Plate

ITEM_ARMOR_007.description: An outfit made from materials obtained from pixies and spirits. It provides some amount of healing to the wearer.
ITEM_ARMOR_007.name: Fairy Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_008.description: Double-layered light armor. Below the fabric made of strong thread material is a chain mail.
ITEM_ARMOR_008.name: Chainmail Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_009.description: Armor said to be worn by foreign knights. Contrary to its appearance, it's easy to move in.
ITEM_ARMOR_009.name: Foreign Armor

ITEM_ARMOR_010.description: A vestment made for high-ranking priests. Not actually worn by elves.
ITEM_ARMOR_010.name: Elven Robe

ITEM_ARMOR_011.description: An outfit made for those who make long trips. It's specially made to assist the movements of the wearer.
ITEM_ARMOR_011.name: Moonlight Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_012.description: Armor made with a large volume of precious dragon material. Because few units have been made, it stands out a lot when worn.
ITEM_ARMOR_012.name: Dragoon Mail

ITEM_ARMOR_013.description: An outfit that is worn as a symbol of the rank of the highest-ranking priests. It's made solely with materials containing large amounts of magical power.
ITEM_ARMOR_013.name: Kruger Cloak

ITEM_ARMOR_014.description: Light armor that is said to absorb sound and light, allowing its wearer to blend into the darkness of night.
ITEM_ARMOR_014.name: Meuchelmolder

ITEM_ARMOR_015.description: Extravagant armor that uses the hardest metal in existence. It's stronger than even dragon scales.
ITEM_ARMOR_015.name: Armanoir

ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.description: A charm that imitates an Uni. It uses a real Uni, and is a very popular gift.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_001.name: Uni Charm

ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.description: As an ornament, it's just a typical pendant. One feels less fatigue just by wearing it for some reason.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_002.name: Energy Pendant

ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.description: A ring that every adventurer knows very well. Its effect changes according to how it's made, and the higher the quality, the more expensive it gets.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_003.name: Gnade Ring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.description: A scarf that is said to make the whole body lighter when worn.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_004.name: Phantom Scarf

ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.description: A locket that is said to allow its wearer to shoulder the hardships of the person they want to protect if they put that person's picture in it.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_005.name: Locket of Devotion

ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.description: An amulet to wish for travelers' safety. It helps the feet feel less fatigued.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_006.name: Migratory Charm

ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.description: A necklace made with a lower volume of metal and designed to last a long time.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_007.name: Quartz Necklace

ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.description: A ring that enhances the magical powers of the wearer.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_008.name: Warlock Ring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.description: A bangle often worn by war-prone soldiers. It assists the movements of the muscles.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_009.name: Warrior Bangle

ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.description: A monocle that makes it possible to measure the distance to the enemy with accuracy and see their vulnerability.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_010.name: Clairvoyance Monocle

ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.description: A ring that is said to bring out the powers of items.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_011.name: Harnal Ring

ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.description: A choker formerly worn by a legendary strategist. Nowadays, it's a fashion item for women.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_012.name: Warrior Choker

ITEM_ACCESSORY_013.description: An amulet that provides the protection of the spirit of the four elements. It's extremely difficult to make.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_013.name: Four Spirits Amulet

ITEM_ACCESSORY_014.description: Cuffs that raise the morale of a group executing a task together, maximizing their efficiency.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_014.name: Cluster Cuffs

ITEM_ACCESSORY_015.description: A crown that makes the wearer look more dignified. It's surprisingly heavy, and wearing it for long periods makes the neck hurt.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_015.name: Baron's Crown

ITEM_ACCESSORY_RESERVE_001.description: An ornament that Kala, of the Oren, wanted. It's not rare in the human world.
ITEM_ACCESSORY_RESERVE_001.name: Dragon Scale Necklace

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.description: A hoe that's snapped in half, or rather completely destroyed. How did it get used to get so badly damaged...?
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_001.name: Broken Hoe

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.description: A hoe fixed by Ryza. It's tougher than normal hoes and can be used to dig even boulders.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_002.name: Light and Sturdy Hoe

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.description: A lamp that uses Fairystones. Federica's late father described it in a drawing.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_003.name: Fairystone Light

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.description: A Fairystone Light improved by Ryza.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_004.name: Fairystone Light EX

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_005.description: A pattern found on the Gate of Honor, drawn by Ryza. It's so poorly drawn that not even a polite compliment is suitable.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_005.name: Scruffy Drawing

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.description: A hair clip with a Fairystone decoration of fire, the symbol of glasswork.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_006.name: Flame Hair Clip

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.description: A brooch with a hammer adornment, the symbol of Fairystone decoration, made by glasswork.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_007.name: Hammer Brooch

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.description: A highly concentrated solution that contains more magic than standard Duet Stock Solution.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_008.name: Duet Stock Solution+

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.description: A solvent with higher concentration than that of Duet Solvent Solution. It allows for even more detailed processing.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_009.name: Duet Solvent Solution EX

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.description: Material found in the ruins of Nemed. It's said to harbor immense powers.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_010.name: Seeds of Light

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.description: An improved version of Seeds of Light with the capacity to suppress the explosive power they harbor.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_011.name: Seeds of Light EX

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.description: A monitoring device installed by the Chief that stops the function of Clairvoyance.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_012.name: Disturbing Bell

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.description: A pseudo-gate generator devised by Emil. It looks like it does not work the way its.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_013.name: Emil's Tablet

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.description: A book left by Emil, detailing why Empel has an artificial arm. Its written in symbols.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_014.name: Emil's Book

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.description: Metal used in the heart of Faurre's devices. It's a strong material with very good power transmission properties.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_015.name: True Silver

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.description: A device that works as a guide to the Code of the Universe. It was dropped by a part of the Code of the Universe.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_016.name: Chart of Another Sky

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.description: The necklace that Ryza gave to Fi last summer. It's worn out after just one year.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_017.name: Fi's Necklace

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.description: Fi's Necklace repaired. A simple necklace, without any special effect.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_018.name: Shiny Necklace

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.description: A pinwheel given by some people to our beloved children, along with a song, wishing for their happiness in the future.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_019.name: Dancing Bird Pinwheel

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.description: The Fairystone Compass that has been processed with True Silver. It became more resistant to damage.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_020.name: Silver Crystal

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.description: A tool that shows the location of the Code of the Universe gate, created by improving the Chart of Another Sky.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_021.name: Celestial Globe of Another Sky

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.description: Very sturdy wood. Suitable for use as a building material.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_022.name: High Quality Wood

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.description: Building materials for the construction of a new inn in the village of Rasenboden.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_023.name: Sturdy Wood

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.description: A device used in the construction of Kurken Island. It's completely broken and beyond repair.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_024.name: Broken Ancient Artifact

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.description: An improved purifier made by Ryza. An engineer, not necessarily an alchemist, can fix it.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_025.name: New Purifier

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.description: An item found in the forest by the late husband of an old lady who lives in Sardonica.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_026.name: Broken Light

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.description: A lamp made based on a recipe left by the alchemist who founded the city of Sardonica.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_027.name: Lamp of the Beginning

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.description: Machine textbook of the people of the Age of God made for the Oren. For beginners, but making the machines is difficult.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_028.name: Age of God Manual

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.description: Bones of an old dragon buried in a shrine of dragons in the Underworld. This dragon was unable to return to the world of humans and died.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_029.name: Dragon Bone Fragment

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_030.description: A jewel made by processing bones of old dragons. It harbors the magical powers of powerful old dragons.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_030.name: Ancient Dragon Gem

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_031.description: A box to store things inside. Neither the box or the objects stored ever deteriorate.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_031.name: Indestructible Box

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_032.description: An auxiliary device for Empel. It smooths the movement of an artificial arm.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_032.name: Auxiliary Prosthesis

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_033.description: A large and substantial lump of meat. It offers the original taste of meat.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_033.name: Wild Meat on the Bone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_034.description: An illustration book left by Federica's father. It was abandoned in the forest for a long time.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_034.name: Father's Album

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_035.description: A purifier that is attached to desalination equipment. It takes the water quality back to the level when there was a fountain in Kurken Island.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_035.name: Desalination Equipment EX

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_036.description: Federica's pendant. It bears a traditional Sardonican crest.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_036.name: Iridescent Mucus

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_039.description: A special coral found on a reef island. Has strong water purification powers.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_039.name: High Quality Coral Stone

ITEM_KEY_ITEM_040.description: A high-purity solvent made from rainbow-colored liquid. Used to fuse Fairystones and glass.
ITEM_KEY_ITEM_040.name: "Agnes Luce" Recipe

ITEM_DLC_041.description: A plush toy modelled after the Oren. It seems the person who it was modelled after also owns one.
ITEM_DLC_041.name: Oren Doll

ITEM_DLC_042.description: A small bell to notify when the food is ready. It's noisy if rung in excess.
ITEM_DLC_042.name: Dinner Bell

ITEM_DLC_043.description: A decorative object modelled after a legendary sword that only the brave can draw. The blade is not present.
ITEM_DLC_043.name: Decorative Sword

ITEM_DLC_044.description: A bed used in high-end inns in the land of everlasting summer. It provides good sleep even on sweltering nights.
ITEM_DLC_044.name: Resort Bed

ITEM_DLC_045.description: A sofa used in high-end inns. It's meant for people to sit and relax for long periods.
ITEM_DLC_045.name: Resort Sofa

ITEM_DLC_046.description: A cheap table with a slightly high-end table cloth.
ITEM_DLC_046.name: Table with Tablecloth

ITEM_DLC_047.description: A pot with a small palm tree. Because it does not grow large, it does not produce nuts.
ITEM_DLC_047.name: Potted Palm

ITEM_DLC_048.description: A music stand used by maestros and flutists. Just place a music score, and it becomes a piece of interior decoration.
ITEM_DLC_048.name: Music Stand

ITEM_DLC_049.description: It appears to be the manuscript of an ancient book, but the letters on it no longer exist, so it requires translation.
ITEM_DLC_049.name: Giant Manuscript

ITEM_DLC_050.description: A pot with a tree that bears a small fruit. It's said that fairies come to eat those fruits.
ITEM_DLC_050.name: Pixie Pot

ITEM_DLC_051.description: A chair designed after the chairs on which the great elementals sit. Because it's design-focused, it's not comfortable.
ITEM_DLC_051.name: Great Elemental's Chair

ITEM_DLC_052.description: A decorative object in the shape of moving stars. It's said that all astronomers have one.
ITEM_DLC_052.name: Celestial Body Model

ITEM_DLC_053.description: A picture of a rural scenery. Because it's a simple rural landscape, it's not among the most popular.
ITEM_DLC_053.name: Farm Photo

ITEM_DLC_054.description: A picture of scenes of a rural town. Its a famous landscape, but nobody knows where the picture was taken.
ITEM_DLC_054.name: Countryside Photo

ITEM_DLC_055.description: A rocking chair made with lightweight material. It can be easily moved anywhere.
ITEM_DLC_055.name: Rocking Chair

ITEM_DLC_056.description: A very common sofa. It has a wide seat that is long enough to accommodate three people comfortably.
ITEM_DLC_056.name: Cute Sofa

ITEM_DLC_057.description: A very common blackboard. It can be used not only for classes but also personal study and work.
ITEM_DLC_057.name: Blackboard

ITEM_DLC_058.description: Everybody has seen this, but nobody has ever met the weapon craftsman who it was modeled after.
ITEM_DLC_058.name: Blacksmith Statue

ITEM_DLC_059.description: Since it's alive, it naturally needs to be looked after. Should be raised as an important family member, not a piece of furniture.
ITEM_DLC_059.name: Goat

ITEM_DLC_060.description: A fully baked bread. It's soft inside, and even the lightly roasted crust is tasty.
ITEM_DLC_060.name: Crisp Bun

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_007.description: A giant rice ball in the shape of a bomb. The filling is inside is a surprise.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_007.name: Packed Rice

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_008.description: A skewer with grilled chicken and vegetables. Available with sauce or salt.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_008.name: Roasted Chicken

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_009.description: A hamburger made with plenty of meat from wild animals. It has a smell unique to wild meat.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_009.name: Gibier Burger

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_010.description: A sandwich with simple ingredients. It tastes almost the same, no matter who makes it.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_010.name: Mixed Sandwich

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_011.description: Smoked meat with a satisfying taste. A precious food for adventurers because it can be stored for long periods.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_011.name: Smoked Meat

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_012.description: A simple pizza with dried meat and cheese. The ones with extra cheese are popular, it seems.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_012.name: Dried Meat Pizza

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_013.description: Carpaccio made of fresh fish. It's the perfect dish for the summer with its refreshing taste.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_013.name: Fresh Fish Carpaccio

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_014.description: Pot-au-feu with summer vegetables. It's tasty, but you'll sweat a lot if you eat it on a warm day.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_014.name: Summer Veggie Stew

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_015.description: Green pasta made with the image of a forest in mind. Vegetables were kneaded into the dough as well.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_015.name: Forest Green Pasta

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_016.description: Paella with plenty of seafood. Very popular among seafood lovers.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_016.name: Seafood Paella

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_017.description: The color makes it look super spicy, but it's actually mild, with a condensed umami flavor.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_017.name: Red Chili Soup

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_018.description: Steak grilled on a hot crystal plate. It does not leave burn marks or cause oil splatter, but the oil makes it easy for the steak to slide off.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_018.name: Steak on Crystal

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_019.description: A dish that is simply a huge whole roasted fish, but it's one of the most popular, perhaps because of how it looks.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_019.name: Roasted Monster Fish

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_020.description: Omelette rice with demi-glace sauce. A standard menu item that is found in almost any store.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_020.name: Beef Omelette Rice

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_021.description: Vegetables and meat simmered in white sauce. Stew fans will definitely like this one too.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_021.name: White Sauce Ragu

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_057.description: A cute chick doll. It has the perfect size for a hug pillow.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_057.name: Chick Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_058.description: An ornament made by sculpting a crystal. When placed by a window, the shadow of the pattern is projected on the floor.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_058.name: Crystal Object

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_059.description: Dolls of fairies. Because all are handmade, each face is slightly different.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_059.name: Fairy Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_060.description: It looks, feels, and smells like jelly. But it's purely for decoration and cannot be eaten.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_060.name: Puni Jelly

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_061.description: A doll made to look exactly like a real Puni. It's said that not even the person who made it can distinguish it from the real thing.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_061.name: Puni Doll

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_062.description: A stand designed to have an object be placed on it for the purpose of being seen and admired.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_062.name: Exhibition Stand

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_063.description: Lighting equipment with the shape of a lantern. The fire that is the light source is also fake.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_063.name: Hanging Lantern

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_064.description: A small round table for quick meals. It only has room for tea and snacks.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_064.name: Round Table

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_065.description: A luxurious leather-covered sofa. It looks hard, but it's so soft that your body sinks into it.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_065.name: Leather Sofa

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_001.description: The finest sofa designed to provide perfect comfort. If you sit once, you will not feel like standing up.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_001.name: Chic Sofa

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_002.description: A low table with a design that is not too flashy or too simple and yet has presence.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_002.name: Elegant Low Table

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_003.description: A large pendulum clock. Because it rings every hour, it's the perfect piece of furniture for those who care about time.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_003.name: Pendulum Clock

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_004.description: A full 88-key piano. The keys are light so that children and beginners can play it.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_004.name: Piano

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_005.description: A single bed with a simple design. After a few years, it starts to feel cramped.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_005.name: Cute Bed

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_006.description: A luxurious bed made for aristocrats. It's superior sleeping comfort is unforgettable.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_006.name: Extravagant Bed

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_007.description: A barrel, as you know! Whenever you touch or see it, you say 'barrel.'
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_007.name: Barrel

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_008.description: A fancy bench. It was designed to match lawns.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_008.name: Fashionable Bench

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_009.description: A table made to be used in gardens. Apparently, it's often used indoors as well.
ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_009.name: Garden Table

ITEM_FURNITURE_ARTICLE_RESERVE_010.description: A pot with seasonal flowers. If not watered every day, they dry out very easily.
